“(My son) is not the same since we were reunited… He cries when he does not see me. That behavior is not normal.”

This Administration is committing a human rights violation.
https://twitter.com/ACLU/status/1015231894290456577 QT @ACLU The Trump administration is subjecting children to trauma that could last a lifetime.

I will restore my people Israel, they shall rebuild & inhabit their ruined cities,Plant vineyards & drink the wine,set out gardens & eat the fruits. I will plant them upon their own ground;never again shall they be plucked From the land I have given them.  Amos 9:14-15

Republicans and this Administration have sabotaged the Affordable Care Act at every turn, causing premiums to rise. Americans should not have to pay the price because they’re playing politics with health care.

It’s a false choice that you can either have a strong economy or you can protect workers, the environment, and make investments in education. California is doing both. 
https://www.bloomberg.com/view/articles/2018-05-29/trump-vs-california-state-s-economy-vastly-outpaces-u-s http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dhi_q0qWkAQB1XC.jpg

Teachers across the country this year stood together and organized for better wages and resources for their students. Now, they’re running for office. 
https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1014305293407215617 QT @NPR In the states where teachers walked off the job this year, more than 70 educators are running for office.
https://www.npr.org/2018/07/02/625279409/w-va-teachers-campaign-for-public-office-during-summer-break?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20180703&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20180703
